EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-09-13-Q3 Partner Town Hall.Q3 Town Hall Email Send 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us tomorrow for the Q3 Turbonomic Partner Town Hall!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-partner-townhall-webinar/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}}, As a valued partner, we would like to invite you to join us on our upcoming Partner Town Hall Meeting. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-partner-townhall-webinar/]]> This live webinar is taking place on Tuesday, September 19th at 11:00 AM EST.
Join us in this opportunity to connect with partners and look at our top initiatives for Q3 as they pertain to the channel. We will be discussing the following:
- Partner Program Update—Partner First Focus
- New Pricing and Packaging Review
- Turbonomic 6.0 Release Overview
- Q & A
We hope that you will join us for this live webinar, demo and Q&A about Turbonomic. This webinar will be approximately 45 minutes and will have a 15 minute Q & A session to voice any questions, concerns, and feedback. Register here <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-partner-townhall-webinar/]]> to join us on September, 19th at 11:00 AM EST. I look forward to seeing you on the call,
Jennifer Heard Chief Partner Officer
